page.title: 08Questionnaire
page.content:
James and I,Alexis,produced the questionnaire to find out about the people in our D-Block and their lives. We sent out a questionnaire to every household,2 to St.Martin's,4 to Bryher and 37 to Tresco;43 in all but only 17 were{returned, 40%}of those sent out. The answers are to the nearest 1% of the returned questionnaires.
Question 1. {How long have you lived on the Isles {of Scilly? No of Years 0-10 11-20 21-30 31-40 41-50 51-60 60+ {35% 12% 24% 0% 0% 18% 6%
Question 2. {How long have you lived in you house? No.of Years 0-10 11-20 21-30 31-40 41-50 51-60 60+ {60% 12% 12% 6% 6% 6% 0%
